mean_cn: n.广播或电视节目；  v.播放，广播
mean_en: to tell a lot of people about something; to send out programmes on television or radio
sentence: A broadcast is a program, a performance, or a speech on the radio or on television.
sentence_trans: 广播电视节目是指在收音机里或在电视上播放的节目、表演或演说。
word_etyma: broad宽广 + cast投射 → 广播, 播音
